import{useMemo}from'react';import{isAddress}from'../utils';import useENSAddress from'./useENSAddress';import useENSName from'./useENSName';/**
 * Given a name or address, does a lookup to resolve to an address and name
 * @param nameOrAddress ENS name or address
 */export default function useENS(nameOrAddress){var validated=isAddress(nameOrAddress);var reverseLookup=useENSName(validated?validated:undefined);var lookup=useENSAddress(nameOrAddress);return useMemo(function(){return{loading:reverseLookup.loading||lookup.loading,address:validated?validated:lookup.address,name:reverseLookup.ENSName?reverseLookup.ENSName:!validated&&lookup.address?nameOrAddress||null:null};},[lookup.address,lookup.loading,nameOrAddress,reverseLookup.ENSName,reverseLookup.loading,validated]);}
